email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CFR terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN GLORY, which is currently available for your route. The starting freight rate is USD 25/MT. The laycan is October 20-25. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for the prompt response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering it to USD 22/MT?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
John,

I understand your concern. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 23/MT. The vessel OCEAN GLORY has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the rate of USD 23/MT. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and send us the contract for review.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Contract Sent
email_chain.body:
John,

Thank you for your confirmation. I have sent the contract to your email for review. Please let me know if there are any further questions or adjustments needed.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
